casebody.data:
Charter Oak Federal Credit Union v. Daniel J. Del Grosso et al. (12263)

Lavery, Freedman and Cretella, Js.

Argued September 21 decision released October 12, 1993 Daniel Del Grosso, pro se, the appellant (named defendant). Charles J. Irving, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

We have carefully reviewed the issues raised by the named defendant and find them to be without merit.

The judgment is affirmed.
